languages.text: "Не будь вы преступным сбродом, я бы, может, и попробовал припомнить законы наследования, действующие на Футфоле, а так..." {n}Соломон с хрустом разминает шею.{/n} "Обойдетесь".

"Were this not a gathering of criminal rabble, maybe I'd make an effort to recall the inheritance laws in effect on Footfall. But seeing as that is what you are..." {n}Solomorne cracks his neck.{/n} "...you're fresh out of luck."
languages.original_text: "Не будь вы преступным сбродом, я бы, может, и попробовал припомнить законы наследования, действующие на Футфоле, а так..." {n}Соломон с хрустом разминает шею.{/n} "Обойдетесь".

traits.locale_text: "Were this not a gathering of criminal rabble, maybe I would try to recall the inheritance laws in effect on Footfall, but seeing as that is what you are..." {n}Solomorne cracks his neck.{/n} "You're out of luck."

languages.text: “如果这里不是一大群犯罪分子的聚会现场，或许我会努力回忆一下落脚港关于财产继承的法律条款，但既然你变成了这个样子……”{n}索罗蒙转了转脖子。{/n}“……你的运气真不怎么样。”
languages.original_text: "Were this not a gathering of criminal rabble, maybe I'd make an effort to recall the inheritance laws in effect on Footfall. But seeing as that is what you are..." {n}Solomorne cracks his neck.{/n} "...you're fresh out of luck."

traits.locale_text: “如果这里不是一大群犯罪分子的聚会现场，或许我会努力回忆一下落脚港关于财产继承的法律条款，但既然你变成了这个样子……”{n}索罗蒙转了转脖子。{/n}“……你的运气真不怎么样。”

languages.text: «De no ser esto una aglomeración de escoria criminal, tal vez pudiera esforzarme por recordar las leyes hereditarias aplicables en Paso. No obstante, ya que eso es lo que sois...». {n}Solomorne hace crujir su cuello.{/n} «... Se os ha acabado la suerte».
languages.original_text: "Were this not a gathering of criminal rabble, maybe I'd make an effort to recall the inheritance laws in effect on Footfall. But seeing as that is what you are..." {n}Solomorne cracks his neck.{/n} "...you're fresh out of luck."

traits.locale_text: «De no ser esto una aglomeración de escoria criminal, tal vez pudiera esforzarme por recordar las leyes hereditarias aplicables en Paso. No obstante, ya que eso es lo que sois...». {n}Solomorne hace crujir su cuello.{/n} «... Se os ha acabado la suerte».

languages.text: « Si je n'avais pas affaire à un véritable rassemblement de racailles, je tenterais de faire l'effort de me remémorer les lois de Castel concernant les héritages. Mais vu qui vous êtes... {n}Solomorne s'interrompt pour faire craquer sa nuque, avant de reprendre :{/n} aujourd'hui n'est visiblement pas votre jour de chance. »
languages.original_text: "Were this not a gathering of criminal rabble, maybe I'd make an effort to recall the inheritance laws in effect on Footfall. But seeing as that is what you are..." {n}Solomorne cracks his neck.{/n} "...you're fresh out of luck."

traits.locale_text: « Si je n'avais pas affaire à un véritable rassemblement de racailles, je tenterais de faire l'effort de me remémorer les lois de Castel concernant les héritages. Mais vu qui vous êtes... {n}Solomorne s'interrompt pour faire craquer sa nuque, avant de reprendre :{/n} aujourd'hui n'est visiblement pas votre jour de chance. »

languages.text: 「ここが犯罪者どもの集まりでなければ、フットフォールで有効な相続法を思い出そうと努力したかもしれない。でも、お前たちがその『犯罪者ども』である以上…」{n}ソロモーンは首を鳴らした。{/n}「…お前たちの運の尽きだ」
languages.original_text: "Were this not a gathering of criminal rabble, maybe I'd make an effort to recall the inheritance laws in effect on Footfall. But seeing as that is what you are..." {n}Solomorne cracks his neck.{/n} "...you're fresh out of luck."

traits.locale_text: 「ここが犯罪者どもの集まりでなければ、フットフォールで有効な相続法を思い出そうと努力したかもしれない。でも、お前たちがその『犯罪者ども』である以上…」{n}ソロモーンは首を鳴らした。{/n}「…お前たちの運の尽きだ」

languages.text: "Suçlu ayaktakımından oluşan bir toplantıda olmasaydık miras yasalarının Binliman üzerindeki etkilerini hatırlatmak için çabalayabilirdim. Fakat sizlerin ne olduğunu bildiğimden..." {n}Solomorne boynunu kütletiyor.{/n} "Şansınızı kaybettiniz diyelim."
languages.original_text: "Were this not a gathering of criminal rabble, maybe I'd make an effort to recall the inheritance laws in effect on Footfall. But seeing as that is what you are..." {n}Solomorne cracks his neck.{/n} "...you're fresh out of luck."

traits.locale_text: "Suçlu ayaktakımından oluşan bir toplantıda olmasaydık miras yasalarının Binliman üzerindeki etkilerini hatırlatmak için çabalayabilirdim. Fakat sizlerin ne olduğunu bildiğimden..." {n}Solomorne boynunu kütletiyor.{/n} "Şansınızı kaybettiniz diyelim."

languages.text: "Wäre das keine Versammlung kriminellen Gesindels, würde ich vielleicht versuchen, mich an die geltenden Erbschaftsgesetze auf Footfall zu erinnern. Aber da Ihr genau das seid ..." {n}Solomorne lässt seinen Hals knacken.{/n} "... hat Euch gerade das Glück verlassen."
languages.original_text: "Were this not a gathering of criminal rabble, maybe I'd make an effort to recall the inheritance laws in effect on Footfall. But seeing as that is what you are..." {n}Solomorne cracks his neck.{/n} "...you're fresh out of luck."

traits.locale_text: "Wäre das keine Versammlung kriminellen Gesindels, würde ich vielleicht versuchen, mich an die geltenden Erbschaftsgesetze auf Footfall zu erinnern. Aber da Ihr genau das seid ..." {n}Solomorne lässt seinen Hals knacken.{/n} "... hat Euch gerade das Glück verlassen."
